title: P&G Recalls Old Spice, Secret Antiperspirant Sprays After Cancer-Causing Chemical Found
sub_head: Company is recalling the antiperspirant sprays after it detected benzene in some products
body:
Procter & Gamble Co. is recalling its Old Spice and Secret antiperspirant sprays after it detected benzene, a cancer-causing chemical, in some of the products.
The consumer- goods maker said anyone who owns the sprays should stop using them and throw them away. The company has also notified retailers to stop selling them.
